description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. How fast can you tap? Featuring 1 button and 2 button alternating modes, train your trigger fingers to compete with the best.
description.short: How fast can you tap? Featuring 1 button and 2 button alternating modes, train your trigger fingers to compete with the best.
